meaningMnemonic: A <radical>cheap</radical> <radical>tree</radical> has a <kanji>plan</kanji>. A plan to stay cheap.
readingMnemonic: The cheap tree's <kanji>plan</kanji> involves only buying <reading>an</reading>chovies (あん) and surviving on them. Good exposure to the sun and fresh water is too expensive. The tree plans to save money by eating anchovies.
